definitions.text: the social force that binds you to the courses of action demanded by that force; ; - John D.Rockefeller Jr
examples: we must instill a sense of duty in our children
every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty

definitions.text: the state of being obligated to do or pay something
examples: he is under an obligation to finish the job

definitions.text: a personal relation in which one is indebted for a service or favor
a written promise to repay a debt
a legal agreement specifying a payment or action and the penalty for failure to comply
